attributes.action: Recognise that camping is a form of "open-air recreation"
attributes.additional_details: Camping is a form of recreation, and a reversal of a decades old tradition due to this not being recognised is unjust to the people who want to use Dartmoor for this purpose.
attributes.background: Reverse the ban of legal right of wild camping in Dartmoor, in areas without the landowners permission

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. Decisions about legal cases referred to the courts are a matter for judiciary, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Enshrine in law rights to roam and wild camp in national parks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631241
